SectionBody.Text: In an action for dissolution pursuant to s. 607.1430, the court may, upon a showing of sufficient merit to warrant such remedy:

Subsection.Text: Appoint a receiver or custodian pendente lite as provided in s. 607.1432;
Appoint a provisional director as provided in s. 607.1435;
Order a purchase of the complaining shareholder’s shares pursuant to s. 607.1436; or
Upon proof of good cause, make any order or grant any equitable relief other than dissolution or liquidation as in its discretion it may deem appropriate.
